Date: 2024-11-13 12:31
Subject: RSO UAE - STORE Opening  - Tory Burch - The Outlet Village
--------------------------------------------------
Dear All,

 

Kindly be informed that we have an Opening of New Store “Tory Burch Boutique at The Outlet Village”.

 

the handover from project team is on Monday 09th Dec, and the opening date is on Thursday 12th Dec 2024.

 

To ensure a smooth opening, each stakeholder is required to complete the necessary actions on time. A project checklist been submitted, and you received an email notification.

 

Please ensure to scroll down, click on Edit then update the status of each task.

 

Best Regards,

RAMEZ ZEBDIE​​​​

SENIOR ASSOCIATE ‑ RSO

ALLIED ENTERPRISES LLC

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

+971 4 563 2000

+971504769298
